pullRequest.title: AF-2576: Allow users to export dashboards using REST API
pullRequest.bodyText:
Exposing export feature in a REST endpoint.
Testing:

Start Business Central
Using a browser access http://localhost:8080/business-central/rest/dashbuilder/export
A ZIP should be downloaded with pages, datasets and navigation
Do the same with the Data Transfer UI - it should be the same ZIP.

commit.message: AF-2576: Allow users to export dashboards using REST API

nodes.bodyText:
Should we really propagate the IOException?
In case of an exception, maybe it's worth catching it and returning a more friendly message inside a response error 500.
@jesuino mind to remove this import? It's not being used anymore.
